name: Teaching Bird 2: The Apprentice
description:
The sequel to the hit game Teaching Bird, check it out here -> https://miniver-games.itch.io/teaching-bird

In this game you get recruited by the quizzing bird, YOU become the quizz master as an apprentice of Teaching Bird. Do you listen to him? Or do you cooperate with the quizzees?

There are multiple routes and endings, try to get as much content as possible out of playing experience!

May contain slightly graphic  pixel art imagery.
